segments.text: Jenny , I was wondering if you , um ... are you busy this Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Friday I have a class right after work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . What about Saturday ? Are you free then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Saturday my parents are coming to town . What's up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about tonight ? Do you have plans tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Did you want to go do something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes ! Yes ! I want to take you to dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! That sounds great ! How about six o'clock ?
segments.speaker: S2
